title.rendered: Handshake Virtual Career Fair Demo – June 2020

content.rendered:
Resources shared during the session:

  • Check out the Virtual Fair Launch Kit for how-to guides, email templates, and videos to promote your virtual fair to your students and employers.
  • Read this overview of Handshake’s pre-fair and day-of support for our higher ed partners, employers, and students.
  • Read these best practices for how your team can staff and support your own virtual fairs.
  • Check out our Virtual Fair FAQ and pricing overview for details on usage guidelines, features, and more.

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Join the Handshake Team for a demo of the virtual career fair features we’re building for our partners. These features are scheduled to be released in July 2020.
